questions.question: 1.  Which of the following best describes the location of Austin's first colony?

choices.answer: In central Texas, west of Filisola's colony and east of Cameron's colony.
In central Texas, north of Milam's colony and east of Woodbury’s colony.
Along the Gulf coast, west of Vehlein's colony and east of DeWitt’s/De Leon
Along Gulf coast,west of De Leon's colony/east of McMullen and McLoin's

questions.question: How did Spain attempt to control Texas during the Spanish Colonial era?

choices.answer: It gave large tracts of land to Spaniards who settled there.
It fought wars with the United States, Mexico, and France.
It established missions and military posts.
It forced NativeAmericans out of their traditional lands.

questions.question: To what extent did Stephen F. Austin succeed or fail at continuing the dreams of his father?

choices.answer: He failed by leadinga rebellion that was crushed by the Mexican army.
He succeeded by founding the first Anglo-American colony in Texas.
He succeeded by founding the first protected reservation for Native Texans.
He failed by dying before slavery in Texas was outlawed.

choices.answer: Revolution and Republic

questions.question: Which explains how Moses Austin benefited from the economic depression in America and Spanish fear of invasion?

choices.answer: Royal authorities accepted Austin's economic plan to reform Texas economy
Austin was able to enter Texas and convince the viceregal government
Americans looking to regain their fortunes, Spain wanted more people in TX
Austin able to fuel revolution by citing the harsh taxes imposed by Spain

questions.question: Which of the following events helped Americans Moses Austin and Stephen Austin settle Texas?

Mexican parliament let American settlers in TX/ arguing with Spain no good.
Baron de Bastrop convinced  gov that Moses's plan was not plan to take land
Austin gained support for movement in Missouri while Moses Austin traveled

questions.question: In what way was Martin de León unique in comparison to the other empresarios?

choices.answer: He was the founder ofthe only Native American settlement
He was the onlyempresario born in Spain
He was the founder ofthe only unsuccessful Spanish settlement
He was the only Mexican empresario

questions.question: Similar to Martin de León, Erasmo Seguín was unique amongst the Anglo-Americans settling in Texas because

choices.answer: He was a Mexican working in the interest of Anglosettlers
He was an Americaninvolved in Mexican politics
His father was bornin Spain
His mother was amember of the Caddo tribe

questions.question: Green DeWitt, Martin de León, and James McGloin all profited from Mexico's fear that

choices.answer: Anglo-Americans wouldtry to take over parts of Texas
Texas was too sparsely populated to defend againstinvasion
Native Texans wouldrevolt against the Mexican government
The suffering economywould cause Mexico to collapse

questions.question: What was the root of the conflict between Green DeWitt and Martin de León?

choices.answer: Land rights
Religion
The legality of slavery
Trade routes into the settlements

questions.question: Which of the following motivations to settle Texas was shared by Americans and the Spanish?

choices.answer: The desire to make money
The desire to convert the Native Texan
The desire to increase trade
The desire to protect the land from invasion

questions.question: Which of the following resulted from the shared desire of Mexico and America to settle Texas?

choices.answer: The Texan economy grew stronger
The French were driven out of Texas
Tensions rose between Mexico and America
Native Texans wereforced to move to reservations

questions.question: Which of the following was a motivation to settle Texas that was shared by Mexico and Spain?

choices.answer: The desire to expand trade westward
The desire to continue the
The desire to create a more stable economy

choices.answer: The missions andpresidios were too small for American needs
Its focus on converting people to Catholic not a goal of American settlers
Mission-presidio was meant to begin process of building cities not American

questions.question: How would the empresario system used by Anglo settlers of Texas NOT have fit Spanish purposes for settling?
Which of the following was a concern of both Spanish and American settlers of Texas?

choices.answer: Native Texans attacking their settlements
A revolution similar to the one seen in Haiti
